name: Space Survivors (ChaosWhiskey)
description:
Made in roughly 72 Hours for the ScoreSpace Jam #23!

Space Survivors is a Top Down Horde shooter game where you have to run trough a procedural generated map and kill an infinite zombie horde while also not dying of either hunger, thirst and suffocation.

Credits:

https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Orbitron

https://www.hdwallpapers.net/space/far-off-planets-wallpaper-657.htm

https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Gloria+Hallelujah?category=Handwriting

Dark Souls III (for Player Death)

https://arongranberg.com/astar/

https://www.dafont.com/optimusprinceps.font

and LootLocker for the Leaderboard Function.
